level.text: The contracting officer shall complete and certify the accuracy of the bid abstract prior to contract award.
The contacting officer shall promptly publish the bid abstract on the Internet.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 1432 (February 26, 1988); as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 3714 (March 6, 2012)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 6290, 6300 (June 1, 2012).
